testcase.name: Contract: Item constructor should have a manufacturer address
Contract: Item constructor should have an itemId
Contract: Item constructor should have a make
Contract: Item constructor should have a model
Contract: Item constructor should have a color
Contract: Item constructor should have a manufactureDate
Contract: Item constructor should have a factoryId
Contract: Item constructor should be created in the Active state
testcase.classname: should be created in the Active state

testcase.name: Contract: Item constructor should emit a WorkbenchContractCreated event
Contract: Item RegisterItem should register itself successfully
Contract: Item RegisterItem should emit a WorkbenchContractUpdated event
Contract: Item RegisterItem should not change Item state
Contract: Item RegisterItem should revert if item is retired
testcase.classname: should revert if item is retired

testcase.name: Contract: Item Retire should change state to Retired
Contract: Item Retire should emit a WorkbenchContractUpdated event
Contract: BasicItemRegistry constructor should be nameable
Contract: BasicItemRegistry constructor should be describable
Contract: BasicItemRegistry constructor should start off in the Created state
testcase.classname: should start off in the Created state

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry constructor should emit a WorkbenchContractCreated event
Contract: BasicItemRegistry OpenRegistry should set an open state
Contract: BasicItemRegistry OpenRegistry should emit a WorkbenchContractUpdated event
Contract: BasicItemRegistry CloseRegistry should set a closed state
Contract: BasicItemRegistry CloseRegistry should emit a WorkbenchContractUpdated event
Contract: BasicItemRegistry RegisterItem state: Create should not register an item when in the Created state
testcase.classname: should not register an item when in the Created state

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry RegisterItem state: Open should register an item when in the Open state
testcase.classname: should register an item when in the Open state

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry RegisterItem state: Closed should not register an item when in the Closed state
testcase.classname: should not register an item when in the Closed state

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry RegisterItem events should emit a WorkbenchContractUpdated event when item is successfully registered
testcase.classname: should emit a WorkbenchContractUpdated event when item is successfully registered

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions IsRegisteredItemContractAddress should return true for registered item addresses
testcase.classname: should return true for registered item addresses

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions IsRegisteredItemContractAddress should return false if given an unknown address
testcase.classname: should return false if given an unknown address

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions IsRegisteredItemId should return true for registered item ids
testcase.classname: should return true for registered item ids

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions IsRegisteredItemId should return false if given an unknown id
testcase.classname: should return false if given an unknown id

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions GetItemByAddress should return the correct item Id given an address
testcase.classname: should return the correct item Id given an address

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions GetItemByAddress should revert if given an unknown address
testcase.classname: should revert if given an unknown address

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions GetItemByItemId should return the correct item address given an Id
testcase.classname: should return the correct item address given an Id

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions GetItemByItemId should revert if given an unknown Id
testcase.classname: should revert if given an unknown Id

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions GetNumberOfRegisteredItems should return the number of items in the registry
testcase.classname: should return the number of items in the registry

testcase.name: Contract: BasicItemRegistry view functions GetItemAtIndex should return the correct item for a given index
testcase.classname: should return the correct item for a given index
